xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnAssetsAndL: 1. Other non current financial liabilities include Lease Liabilities of Rs. 2,734 Crore. 2. Other current financial liabilities include Lease Liabilities of Rs. 101 Crore. 3. Net Worth as at 30th September 2023 is Rs. 447,143 Crore. 4. Outstanding Capital Redemption Reserve/Debenture Redemption Reserve as at 30th September 2023 is Rs. 1,683 Crore. 5. Notes to Cash Flow: i) Changes in Trade and Other Receivables have been shown under Adjustments for decrease / (increase) in trade receivables, current. ii) Changes in Trade and Other Payables have been shown under Adjustments for increase / (decrease) in trade payables, current. iii) Proceeds from exercise of stock options - Rs. 1,50,000.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: 1. Q2 FY24 Segment Revenue includes Rs 6,895 crore GST recovered. Net Revenue is Rs 140,450 crore. 2. H1 FY24 Segment Revenue includes Rs 13,218 crore GST recovered. Net Revenue is Rs 266,349 crore. 3. Oil to Chemicals Segment results includes Interest income/Other Income pertaining to it's segment.
